CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ascent Industries Co is engaged in the chemical and metal industry. The group operates into two reportable segments namely the Ascent Tubular Products and the Specialty Chemicals Segment. It manufactures welded pipe and tube, primarily from stainless steel, duplex, and nickel alloys. The company also produces specialty chemicals and dyes used in various end markets.
